A '''taterstone slab''' is a [[taterstone]] variant of a [[slab]], added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|Taterstone Slab|Hoe|Wood|horizontal=1|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Taterstone slabs naturally generate in [[colosseum]]s, [[ruined portatol]]s, and [[potato village]]s.
